Per communication today with Ms. Danna Thompson's assistant, please
immediately remove the following pornographic and vulgar inks that cite
my name, Sandy Straus:  
     
  ivyrosexxxcom.studsi.dnip.net/  
     
  urdx-cc.urdx-ccm.kamera.dnip.net/  
     
  wwwfromherasstohermouthcom.ficur.dnip.net/

  www-candidrio-com.hithir.yi.org/  
     
     
  My concern is that I am being stalked and someone is using a Verio
provider and exploiting Google as a means of creating privacy, safety,
and security risks to me.  
     
     
  Hence my safety security, and privacy are all at risk as this
continues on a daily basis.  
     
  I realize this is a holiday weekend only I urge you to monitor and
trace this individual (or individuals) at once.  
     
  Thank you for your attention and for deleting this pronographic and
vulgar matter.  
     
  Sincerely yours,  
     
  Sandy Straus

  Dear Ms Danna Thompson:  
  
Please be advised that I need to report several other other pornographic
websites to your immediate attention.  
  
I truly hope there is a way to stop these websites at once. I should not
feel that I am in constant fear of this pornographic material surfacing
on Google.  
     
  It seems that every time these webpages are deleted, even more
re-appear.  
  This should be traceable.  There must be someone who is feeding my
name into this Verio web server and loop and continuously posing a
serious safety, privacy, and .security threat to me by posting it on
Google.  
  
This relates to our earlier communication, per telephone and email
communication, that my request to have my name, "Sandy Straus" deleted
immediately and completely from the Verio service provider, who creates
and maintains the below mentioned URL addresses (of pornographic
nature), and the Google search engines (who is fed the name "Sandy
Straus" through these websites) and other affiliated websites (where the
name "Sandy Straus" is fed) and related cached copies.  
  
As discussed, the Verio service provider is posing a security threat and
a violation of my privacy by posting my name throughout their
pornographic websites and numerous subdomains. These domains are hosted

through Verio.   
  
These websites appear when googling "sandy straus"  
(either with or without quotes). New websites appear on a daily basis.
This needs to stop. The  
content is pornographic and unsuitable.   
  
Please note the new websites below that require immediate deletion.  
  
The posting and generation of these pornographic websites with my name
on Google, via Verio and its service provider(s), need to end once and
for all.  
  
The fact that these are continuously being posted seriously worries me
and poses a safety, security, and  
privacy risk to me.   
  
Please e-mail me if you have any further questions.  
  
Thank you for your immediate assistance with this urgent matter of
security and privacy.  
  
  
  
Sincerely yours,  
  
Sandy Straus
